info.title: Microsoft Cognitive Language Service - Analyze Text Authoring
info.description: The language service API is a suite of natural language processing (NLP) skills built with best-in-class Microsoft machine learning algorithms. The API can be used to analyze unstructured text for tasks such as sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, language detection and question answering. Further documentation can be found in https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/language-service/overview.

post.description: Assign new Azure resources to a project to allow deploying new deployments to them. This API is available only via AAD authentication and not supported via subscription key authentication. For more details about AAD authentication, check here: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/authentication?tabs=powershell#authenticate-with-azure-active-directory

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/azure/Guidelines.md#handling-errors.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

values.name: separateComponents
values.description: Every component's match or prediction is returned as a separate instance of the entity.

values.name: combineComponents
values.description: When two or more components are found in the text and overlap, the components' spans are merged together into one span combining all of them.

DataGenerationSetting.description: Represents the settings for using data generation as part of training a custom model.

enableDataGeneration.description: If set to true, augment customer provided training data with synthetic data to improve model quality.

dataGenerationConnectionInfo.description: Represents the connection info for the Azure resource to use during data generation as part of training a custom model.

values.name: percentage
values.description: Split the data into training and test sets according to user-defined percentages.

values.name: manual
values.description: Split the data according to the chosen dataset for every example in the data.

values.name: CustomSingleLabelClassification
values.description: For building a classification model to classify text using your own data. Each file will have only one label. For example, file 1 is classified as A and file 2 is classified as B.

values.name: CustomMultiLabelClassification
values.description: For building a classification model to classify text using your own data. Each file can have one or many labels. For example, file 1 is classified as A, B, and C and file 2 is classified as B and C.

values.name: CustomEntityRecognition
values.description: For building an extraction model to identify your domain categories using your own data.

values.name: CustomAbstractiveSummarization
values.description: For building an abstractive summarization models which are able to summarize long documents.

values.name: CustomHealthcare
values.description: For building an text analytics for health model to identify your health domain data.

values.name: CustomTextSentiment
values.description: For building a sentiment models which are able to extract sentiment for long documents.

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description: The offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Java, JavaScript.

TextAnalysisAuthoringAssignDeploymentRes.description: Represents the options for assigning Azure resources to a project.

resourcesMetadata.description: Represents the metadata for the resources to be assigned.

TextAnalysisAuthoringAssignedProjectDepl.description: Represents the metadata for an assigned deployment

deploymentExpirationDate.description: Represents deployment expiration date in the runtime.

TextAnalysisAuthoringAssignedProjectDepl.description: Represents the metadata for assigned deployments for a project.

TextAnalysisAuthoringConfusionMatrixCell.description: Represents a cell in a confusion matrix.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCopyAuthorizationOp.description: Represents the options for authorizing a project copy to the current Azure resource.

storageInputContainerName.description: The name of the storage container.

allowOverwrite.description: Whether to allow an existing project to be overwritten using the resulting copy authorization.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCopyProjectJobState.description: Represents the state of a copy job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCopyProjectOptions.description: Represents the options for copying an existing project to another Azure resource.

targetProjectName.description: The project name to be copied-into.

expiresAt.description: The expiration of the access token.

targetResourceId.description: Represents the target Azure resource ID.

targetResourceRegion.description: Represents the target Azure resource region.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCreateDeploymentOpt.description: Represents the options for creating or updating a project deployment.

assignedResources.description: Represents the resources to be assigned to the deployment. If provided, the deployment will be rolled out to the resources provided here as well as the original resource in which the project is created.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCreateProjectOption.description: Represents the options used to create or update a project.

multilingual.description: Whether the project would be used for multiple languages or not.

language.description: The project language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomEntityRecogni.description: Represents the document evaluation result for a custom entity recognition project.

customEntityRecognitionResult.description: Represents the evaluation prediction for entity recognition.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomEntityRecogni.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom entity recognition project.

customEntityRecognitionEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to extraction evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomHealthcareDoc.description: Represents the document evaluation result for a custom entity recognition project.

customHealthcareResult.description: Represents the evaluation prediction for entity recognition.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomHealthcareEva.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom health care project.

customHealthcareEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to health care evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomMultiLabelCla.description: Represents the document evaluation result for a custom multi-label classification project.

customMultiLabelClassificationResult.description: Represents the evaluation prediction for multi label classification.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomMultiLabelCla.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom multi-label classification project.

customMultiLabelClassificationEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to multi label classification evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomSingleLabelCl.description: Represents the document evaluation result for a custom single-label classification project.

customSingleLabelClassificationResult.description: Represents the evaluation prediction for single label classification.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomSingleLabelCl.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom single-label classification project.

customSingleLabelClassificationEvaluatio.description: Contains the data related to single label classification evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomTextSentiment.description: Represents the document evaluation result for a custom sentiment project.

customTextSentimentResult.description: Represents the evaluation prediction for text sentiment.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomTextSentiment.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom text sentiment project.

customTextSentimentEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to custom sentiment evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDataGenerationConne.description: Represents the connection info for the Azure resource to use during data generation as part of training a custom model.

kind.description: Connection type for data generation settings. Currently only supports Azure Open AI.

resourceId.description: Resource ID for the data generation resource. Looks something like "/subscriptions/<SUBSCRIPTION-ID-GUID>/resourceGroups/<RG-NAME>/providers/Microsoft.CognitiveServices/accounts/<AOAI-ACCOUNT-NAME>".

deploymentName.description: Deployment name of model to be used for synthetic data generation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDeleteDeploymentOpt.description: Represents the options for deleting a project deployment.

assignedResourceIds.description: Represents the resource IDs to delete the deployment from. If not provided, the deployment will be rolled out from all the resources it is deployed to. If provided, it will delete the deployment only from the specified assigned resources, and leave it for the rest.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDeploymentDeleteFro.description: Represents the state of an existing delete deployment from specific resources job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDeploymentJobState.description: Represents the state of a deployment job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDeploymentResource.description: Represents an Azure resource assigned to a deployment.

assignedAoaiResource.description: Represents the AOAI resource assigned for data generation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDeploymentResources.description: Represents the state of a deployment resources job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentEntityLabel.description: Represents an evaluation result entity label.

offset.description: Represents the entity offset index relative to the original text.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentEntityRecog.description: Represents the entity recognition evaluation result for a document.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentEntityRegio.description: Represents the evaluation comparison between the expected and predicted entities of a document region.

expectedEntities.description: Represents the region's expected entity labels.

predictedEntities.description: Represents the region's predicted entity labels.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentEvaluationR.description: Represents the evaluation result of a document.

language.description: Represents the document language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentHealthcareE.description: Represents the healthcare evaluation result for a document.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentMultiLabelC.description: Represents the comparison between the expected and predicted classes that are result from the evaluation operation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentSentimentLa.description: Represents an evaluation result Sentiment label.

offset.description: Represents the sentiment offset index relative to the original text.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentSingleLabel.description: Represents the comparison between the expected and predicted class that result from an evaluation operation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentTextSentime.description: Represents the comparison between the expected and predicted sentiment that result from an evaluation operation.

expectedSentimentSpans.description: Represents the document's expected sentiment labels.

predictedSentimentSpans.description: Represents the document's predicted sentiment labels.

TextAnalysisAuthoringEntityEvaluationSum.description: Represents the evaluation summary for an entity.

truePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of true positive

trueNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of true negative

falsePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of false positive

falseNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of false negative

TextAnalysisAuthoringEntityRecognitionEv.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom entity recognition project.

confusionMatrix.description: Represents the confusion matrix between two entities (the two entities can be the same). The matrix is between the entity that was labelled and the entity that was predicted.

microF1.description: Represents the micro F1. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

microPrecision.description: Represents the micro precision. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

microRecall.description: Represents the micro recall. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

macroF1.description: Represents the macro F1. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

macroPrecision.description: Represents the macro precision. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

macroRecall.description: Represents the macro recall. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

evaluationOptions.description: Represents the options used running the evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringEvaluationJobState.description: Represents the state of a evaluation job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

TextAnalysisAuthoringEvaluationOptions.description: Represents the options used running the evaluation.

kind.description: Represents the evaluation kind. By default, the evaluation kind is set to percentage.

trainingSplitPercentage.description: Represents the training dataset split percentage. Only needed in case the evaluation kind is percentage.

testingSplitPercentage.description: Represents the testing dataset split percentage. Only needed in case the evaluation kind is percentage.

TextAnalysisAuthoringEvaluationSummary.description: Represents the summary for an evaluation operation.

projectKind.description: Represents the project type that the evaluation ran on.

evaluationOptions.description: Represents the options used running the evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportProjectJobSta.description: Represents the state of an export job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

resultUrl.description: The URL to use in order to download the exported project.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedClass.description: Represents a class of an exported project.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedCompositeEn.description: Represents an entity in an exported project with composite entities enabled.

compositionSetting.description: The behavior to follow when the entity's components overlap with each other.

list.description: The list component of the entity.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedCustomAbstr.description: Represents an exported document for a custom abstractive summarization project.

summaryLocation.description: Represents the summary file location in the blob store container associated with the project.

location.description: The location of the document in the storage.

language.description: Represents the document language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

dataset.description: The dataset for this document. Allowed values are 'Train' and 'Test'.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedCustomAbstr.description: Represents the exported assets for an abstractive summarization project.

documents.description: The list of documents belonging to this project.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedCustomEntit.description: Represents an exported document for a custom entity recognition project.

entities.description: The list of entity labels belonging to the document.

location.description: The location of the document in the storage.

language.description: Represents the document language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

dataset.description: The dataset for this document. Allowed values are 'Train' and 'Test'.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedCustomEntit.description: Represents the exported assets for a entity recognition project.

entities.description: The list of entities belonging to the project.

documents.description: The list of documents belonging to the project.

location.description: The location of the document in the storage.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedDocumentCla.description: Represents a classification label for a document.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedDocumentEnt.description: Represents an entity label for a document.

offset.description: Start position for the entity text.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedDocumentEnt.description: Represents a region in a document for entity labeling.

labels.description: The list of entity labels belonging to this region.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedDocumentSen.description: Represents an entity label for a document.

offset.description: Start position for the sentiment text.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedEntity.description: Represents an entity in an exported project.

description.description: Short description for entity category. Required when enabling synthetic data generation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedEntityList.description: Represents a list component of an entity.

sublists.description: The sub-lists of the list component.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedEntityListS.description: Represents a list of synonyms inside a list component

language.description: Represents the language of the synonyms. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

values.description: The list of synonyms.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedEntitySubli.description: Represents a sub-list inside a list component.

synonyms.description: The phrases of that correspond to the sub-list.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

modelFiles.description: The model files belonging to this model.

lastTrainedDateTime.description: The last trained date time of the model.

dataGenerationSettings.description: Represents the settings for using data generation as part of training a custom model.

estimatedEndDateTime.description: Represents the estimate end date time for training and evaluation.

assignedResourceIds.description: Represents the assigned resource IDs to be unassigned.

TextAuthoringProjectSettings.description: Represents the settings used to define the project behavior.

confidenceThreshold.description: The threshold of the class with the highest confidence, at which the prediction will automatically be changed to "None". The value of the threshold should be between 0 and 1 inclusive.

amlProjectPath.description: The path to the AML connected project.

isLabelingLocked.description: Indicates whether the labeling experience can be modified or not.

runGptPredictions.description: Indicates whether to run GPT predictions or not.

gptPredictiveLookahead.description: The predictive lookahead for GPT predictions that is specified by the user.

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.name: api-version
Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.

Azure.Core.MaxPageSizeQueryParameter.name: maxpagesize
Azure.Core.MaxPageSizeQueryParameter.description: The maximum number of result items per page.

Azure.Core.SkipQueryParameter.name: skip
Azure.Core.SkipQueryParameter.description: The number of result items to skip.

Azure.Core.TopQueryParameter.name: top
Azure.Core.TopQueryParameter.description: The number of result items to return.

ProjectKindQueryParameter.name: projectKind
ProjectKindQueryParameter.description: The project kind, default value is CustomSingleLabelClassification.

values.name: CustomSingleLabelClassification
values.description: For building a classification model to classify text using your own data. Each file will have only one label. For example, file 1 is classified as A and file 2 is classified as B.

values.name: CustomMultiLabelClassification
values.description: For building a classification model to classify text using your own data. Each file can have one or many labels. For example, file 1 is classified as A, B, and C and file 2 is classified as B and C.

values.name: CustomEntityRecognition
values.description: For building an extraction model to identify your domain categories using your own data.

values.name: CustomAbstractiveSummarization
values.description: For building an abstractive summarization models which are able to summarize long documents.

values.name: CustomHealthcare
values.description: For building an text analytics for health model to identify your health domain data.

values.name: CustomTextSentiment
values.description: For building a sentiment models which are able to extract sentiment for long documents.

StringIndexTypeQueryParameter.name: stringIndexType
StringIndexTypeQueryParameter.description: Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets. For additional information see https://aka.ms/text-analytics-offsets.

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description: The offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Java, JavaScript.
